item.title: The future was examined at the GREAT Festival of Innovation in Hong Kong
item.description:
The second day of the GREAT Festival of Innovation in Hong Kong brought together over 50 prominent figures from various industries to discuss the future of living. The event, which ran until March 24th, featured experts, business leaders, and creatives sharing their insights with attendees from around the world. With a focus on the prediction that 70% of the global population will reside in urban areas by 2050, the festival examined the implications for how we live, eat, travel, and interact with the natural world through panels and demonstrations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-future-was-examined-at-the-great-festival-of-innovation-in-hong-kong/

item.title: "Credit Suisse identifies three major trends for 2018"
item.description:
Source: Credit Suisse. Cavalli. The sixth annual Credit Suisse Global Megatrends Conference 2018, held in Singapore, focused on three significant trends: technology designed to benefit humanity, including AI and robotics; a future shaped by Millennials; and the expanding silver economy. Benjamin Cavalli, Head of Private Banking Southeast Asia and Singapore CEO of Credit Suisse, explained in his opening remarks that these megatrends represent investment themes based on Credit Suisse’s expert insights...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/credit-suisse-identifies-three-major-trends-for-2018/

item.title: The HUAWEI Mate 10 Pro was first launched in Singapore, making it the first country in the world to introduce the device
item.description:
Huawei recently launched its Mate 10 Series smartphones, including the Mate 10, Mate 10 Pro, and PORSCHE DESIGN Mate 10, in Singapore. The launch makes Singapore the first country globally to have the Mate 10 Pro available for purchase. A key feature of these phones is the Kirin 970 AI chipset, which significantly boosts system response speed and ensures smoother performance. According to Cheng Jiangfei, Country Head of Huawei Singapore, Consumer Business Group, the company is committed to providing Singaporean customers with the latest and greatest technology...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-huawei-mate-10-pro-was-first-launched-in-singapore-making-it-the-first-country-in-the-world-to-introduce-the-device/

item.title: AI Is Going to Eat Your Bandwidth
item.description:
By: John Shepler Human communication might not dominate telecom usage for much longer. It started when computers began sharing data over phone lines and sped up when broadband internet connected almost every computer. Even though people currently use the internet for websites, messaging, social media, videos, backups, and work, machines will soon be the primary users, communicating amongst themselves. The Rise of Artificial Intelligence Artificial intelligence, or AI, has been subtly infiltrating our lives for decades, likely since computers emerged...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ai-is-going-to-eat-your-bandwidth/

item.title: Workers in Singapore are embracing automation and artificial intelligence
item.description:
Singaporean employees believe automation and AI are becoming increasingly prevalent in the workplace, according to the PERSOLKELLY 2019 Q4 APAC Workforce Insights. 41% of those surveyed anticipate their companies will further invest in these technologies within the next two years, primarily in IT (61%) and operations (49%). While over a third (38%) acknowledge the possibility of automation and AI eventually replacing their jobs, there is a general acceptance of these technologies...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/workers-in-singapore-are-embracing-automation-and-artificial-intelligence/

item.title: SEEK's Jobstreet introduces a new employment platform powered by artificial intelligence
item.description:
Jobstreet by SEEK, a leading career and talent platform, has launched a new and improved employment platform powered by SEEK’s AI technology. This upgrade aims to create a better experience for both job seekers and employers by improving job matches and providing more in-depth insights. This initiative is a component of SEEK’s ongoing efforts to unify its online employment platforms across the Asia Pacific region, including SEEK in Australia and New Zealand, Jobstreet in Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and Indonesia, and JobsDB in Hong Kong and Thailand...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/seek-s-jobstreet-introduces-a-new-employment-platform-powered-by-artificial-intelligence/

item.title: Job seekers in Singapore are turning to AI to help ease the difficulties of finding a job
item.description:
A recent Indeed survey of 2,000 Singaporeans found that the biggest hurdles for job seekers are cumbersome recruitment processes, a lack of personalization, and unfair hiring practices. Interestingly, over half of those surveyed believe AI could make job hunting more efficient and effective, potentially improving employment prospects for many. Conducted in December 2017, the research highlighted job seekers’ frustrations with time-consuming and irrelevant application processes. 55% found these processes weren’t tailored to their skills and experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/job-seekers-in-singapore-are-turning-to-ai-to-help-ease-the-difficulties-of-finding-a-job/

item.title: The speech recognition app can transcribe discussions involving several individuals
item.description:
Source: NVIDIA blog post. The Otter team at AISense. AISense, a company based in the US, has introduced Otter, an application that uses GPU technology to record and transcribe speech from multiple speakers. Unlike most currently available software that needs to be trained on a single voice, Otter can accurately recognize and differentiate between various speakers. Sam Liang, AISense co-founder and CEO, highlights in a blog post that capturing human-to-human interactions is significantly more challenging than interactions like those with virtual assistants like Alexa, Siri, or Google Assistant...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-speech-recognition-app-can-transcribe-discussions-involving-several-individuals/

item.title: Recruitment services supported by artificial intelligence offer a more precise matching process
item.description:
AnyMind Group, a company focused on using AI to change industries, has introduced TalentMind, a new business unit featuring AI-powered recruitment software. TalentMind offers a comprehensive platform using natural language processing (NLP), profile analysis, and machine learning to screen, analyze, and match potential candidates with businesses. The platform will launch in four stages: ● TalentMind screening - This stage analyzes social media and resume data to assess a candidate’s cultural fit and personality based on their profile...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recruitment-services-supported-by-artificial-intelligence-offer-a-more-precise-matching-process/

item.title: How AI is Helping to Improve Call Centers
item.description:
By: John Shepler Customer service calls are increasingly frustrating due to rising costs and labor shortages, negatively impacting both customers and companies. Tech expert David Pogue, in a CBS News report, suggests a blend of human agents and AI as a solution. One such AI, called Grace, can handle customer interactions independently. However, AI like Grace can falter in complex situations, necessitating a transfer to human agents. While some of the best agents are located internationally and may have accents, this can be a hurdle for some US customers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/how-ai-is-helping-to-improve-call-centers/

item.title: Honor Magic is redefining the limits of smartphone capabilities
item.description:
Source: Honor. Honor Magic utilizes AI technology to anticipate user needs. Honor, a Huawei Group brand targeting young, tech-savvy consumers, celebrated its third anniversary by introducing the innovative Honor Magic smartphone. This device incorporates artificial intelligence (AI) for a more interactive user experience. The Honor Magic boasts a sleek and ergonomic design featuring a 3D curved glass body. Powered by a Kirin 950 processor, it offers a 5.09" 2K AMOLED curved screen, intelligent sensors, and advanced recognition technology...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/honor-magic-is-redefining-the-limits-of-smartphone-capabilities/

item.title: Huawei has launched the HUAWEI nova 3i
item.description:
Singapore is among the first countries globally to introduce the HUAWEI nova 3i, a midrange smartphone equipped with AI-powered front-facing dual cameras. Huawei aims to make high-end technology and value accessible to budget-conscious consumers, according to Cheng Jiangfei, Managing Director of Huawei Singapore Consumer Business Group. He emphasized that the HUAWEI nova 3i combines stylish design with advanced AI features, offering exceptional quality and functionality at an affordable price. Notable features of the HUAWEI nova 3i include:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/huawei-has-launched-the-huawei-nova-3i/

item.title: The new Mate 10 from Huawei: a portable desktop experience
item.description:
The Huawei Mate 10, unveiled in 2017, builds upon the success of its predecessors like the Mate 7 and Mate 9, offering even more power and efficiency in a compact design. Distinguishing itself as a pocket desktop, the Mate 10 series, particularly the Mate 10 and Mate 10 Pro models, boasts a pioneering AI processor known as the Kirin 970. This processor integrates a neural-network processing unit (NPU), enabling functionalities like real-time computer vision and enhanced photography...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-new-mate-10-from-huawei-a-portable-desktop-experience/

item.title: Scheduling is made easier with Evie, the AI assistant
item.description:
Mimetic.ai, a tech startup, has introduced Evie, an AI-powered scheduling assistant designed to streamline business meeting arrangements. Evie handles communication with participants, finding suitable times for everyone involved. This significantly reduces the usual email ping-pong, saving users time and increasing productivity. Professionals in fields like recruitment, sales, e-commerce, and entrepreneurship are already benefiting from Evie’s assistance. According to mimetic.ai, setting up a single meeting can involve an average of 4.4 emails...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/scheduling-is-made-easier-with-evie-the-ai-assistant/
